channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description: #Welcome to Cool-Aardvark.net ##Weary traveller of the web of the world, you have found the home of the coolest, noctural, termite eating southern african mamual there is. This also happens to be the home of Mark, whoes words, bytes and thoughts can all be found here. ##I hope you enjoy your stay and that might visit again some day!
